channel.title: HostGator [mod lock if i am not allowed]
channel.description: Well if you guys were looking for a cheap domain name and webhosting use hostgator and i found a coupon that will give you the first month for free. When your choosing your plan under neath it will ask for a coupon type in "thanksdavid" it saves $9.95. my friend gave this to me and i used it. so i wanted to give out to more people to save money :)

item.title: HostGator [mod lock if i am not allowed]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:401411”]Well… I’m pretty sure we allow referral links if it benefits everyone and isn’t a misleading link… (like that survey site Jc posted)

I’m not 100% sure though, so another mods views would be good.[/quote]
They normally say that it is allowed but should only be posted in signatures to keep down on flaming and pointless posts.

Read full topic
